introduction.title: Who is Gra Oliveira?
introduction.description:
I'm Gracielly Oliveira, better known as Gra Oliveira, a Brazilian from Trás-os-Montes who has lived in Portugal for 20 years and is here to revolutionize the nail industry and transform Trás-os-Montes!

I've been a nail professional for four years, focusing on techniques that emphasize care, elegance, and naturalness.

In my space, located in Macedo de Cavaleiros, I offer specialized services for both hands and feet, always with attention to detail and the well-being of my clients.

Currently, I also work as a trainer, helping others transform their passion for aesthetics into a solid and rewarding career. Experience the art of nail design with Gra Oliveira. Explore our services, book online, and discover our gallery of stunning nail creations.
